channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dog poo across pavement, 30th October
item.description:
Outside 60/71 Danby Street. Could it be cleaned asap please as it is blocking pavement. Reporting 30/10 at 8:30am.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 77, Danby Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping of 3 full bags bib, 30th October

These fly tipping was done btw Sunday and Monday The recycling time and was collection was around collecting the sacks but they missed ???? Them

item.title: Mattress flytipped on Roydene Road, 30th October
item.description:

item.title: Overgrown plants/weeds, 30th October
item.description:
Overgrown Plants/weeds need cutting back. They havent been cut back gor years. Its overhanging and scratching mine and my neighbours cars that park there. It runs from gate to railway tracks up to the top by new build houses by chesterfield close.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50-72, Wotton Green, St Mary Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tip opposite 125 Athenlay Road, 30th October
item.description:
Mattress etc. flytipped. It looks terrible and is attracting foxes and other animals,. please can you remove asap.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Athenlay Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tip next to gravel bin opposite 42 Rosenthorpe Road and further down the street, 30th October
item.description:
Blue bin abandoned and other waste material . This area is a frequent target. Please can you put posters up etc to try and deter people. It is a regular eyesore.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rosenthorpe Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The whole pavement along the road is a trip hazard. Over 25mm trips all the way a long, 30th October
item.description:
Our road is a close full of elderly people, 1 for example can't use their motorised scooter because the pavements are that bad. They are always tripping up. We have a a pram which is always getting stuck in the uneven slabs. The whole road needs re doing before someone seriously injures themself

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Dane Close, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing bin lid, 30th October
item.description:
The green communal bin lid has been missing after it was burned out months ago. This is attracting rats, residents from other homes/estates dump their rubbish and we see people constantly rifling through our rubbish as well as the smell.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tavistock Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Chute in Edwin house blocked from 2nd floor and above, 30th October
item.description:
